message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  While your offer is tempting, the value this product brings is truly unique. I could consider coming down to $1,275,000.  I believe this represents a fair compromise. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,225,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
